name: Rain-Bow
description:
~~~ THIS IS SUBMISSION FOR TRIJAM #126 (3 - hour gamejam) ~~~

I made a game that perfectly fits the theme and yes, it is a stupid pun.

In Rain-Bow you play as a Bow and you need to shoot clouds. When clouds are gone - you win and rainbow appears.

~~~ Controls ~~~

A/D  or Right Arrow/Left Arrow - Move Left/Right

Space - Shoot

R - Restart

~~~ What I learned during this gamejam ~~~

- Do not force yourself to participating in gamejam if you feel bad or just don't really like the theme

- Sounds add a lot to a game, even if your soundesign capabilites are avarage

- I really need to improve my pixelart skills

- Apparently in "Russian" rainbow is different in colors to "English" rainbow, there is word for light blue in Russian + "indigo" and "violet" are considered to be more or less the same color. I decided to go with somewhat close to LGBT+ colors for my rainbow.

rus - red, orange, yellow, green, light blue, blue, indigo

eng - red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, violet

~~~ What I used ~~~

- Unity

- Aseprite

no third party code or assets were used.

If you are bored and have nothing better to do, check out my Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/1sKui9gwUQ0VxXMoxhnqY3?si=KwyCjN1sQuq3fp-QHwhtnw&...
